summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 3663 , for the improvement of the alley in block 56, Terry's 1st Addition to the City of Seattle, being the alley between 7th Avenue and 8th Avenue, extending from Cherry Street to Columbia Street, by paving under Ordinance No. 45140 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
